Text: @ClammieR - Or it's still a 2.5hr show @ HD720p... :)
ClammieR is not very polite, but I too thought it was only 15 or 20 min, until I saw your comment. I appreciate the UL, though.

VERY Minor spoiler alert for those thinking about downloading this:

Tons of rain in Australia, Q1 was delayed 30 minutes. Track conditions were so bad that the FIA postponed Q2 and Q3 until before the race.

Therefore this download, while complete and 2 hours long, is basically 20 minutes of Q1 and 90 minutes of watching the track guys mop up rain. Plenty of decent commentary and pit row footage though.

THANK YOU very much for uploading this smcgill1969 !!!
Others wouldn't bother doing it only for Q1, but I found it quite interesting...
Thanks so much for taking the time to upload !
Downloading now. Thank you for the upload and for sharing!
thanks for uploading this, seems no one else bothered to :D
Thank you sir for your effort, it is MUCH appreciated!
